0* prompt #1
1-  number of options
2-  result[0/default/option #1] consequence flavor txt
3+    Type //height(0) or love(1) :  union statChange effect (int/long)
4-  result[option #2] consequence flavor text       //optional
5+    Type : union statChange effect (int/long)
6-  result[option #2] consequence flavor txt
7+    Type : union statChange effect (int/long)
8-  result[option #3] consequence flavor text       //optional
9+    Type : union statChange effect (int/long)
10* prompt #2
11-  number of options
12-  result[0/default/option #1] consequence flavor txt
13+    Type //height(0) or love(1) :  union statChange effect (int/long)
14-  result[option #2] consequence flavor text       //optional
15+    Type : union statChange effect (int/long)
16-  result[option #2] consequence flavor txt
17+    Type : union statChange effect (int/long)
18-  result[option #3] consequence flavor text       //optional
19+    Type : union statChange effect (int/long)
20* prompt #3
21-  number of options
22-  result[0/default/option #1] consequence flavor txt
23+    Type //height(0) or love(1) :  union statChange effect (int/long)
24-  result[option #2] consequence flavor text       //optional
25+    Type : union statChange effect (int/long)
26-  result[option #2] consequence flavor txt
27+    Type : union statChange effect (int/long)
28-  result[option #3] consequence flavor text       //optional
29+    Type : union statChange effect (int/long)
...and so on...
